info.title: TU-Recommend API
info.description: Technological University Recommendation & Application System API

nameMyanmar.description: အမည် (မြန်မာ)

nrc.description: နိုင်ငံသားစိစစ်ရေးကတ်ပြားအမှတ်

nameMyanmar.example: မောင်မောင်
နည်းပညာတက္ကသိုလ် (သန်လျင်)
နည်းပညာတက္ကသိုလ် (ရန်ကုန်)
အီလက်ထရောနစ်နှင့် ဆက်သွယ်ရေးအင်ဂျင်နီယာ
ကွန်ပျူတာအင်ဂျင်နီယာ

programIds.description: Array of 2-5 program IDs to compare

tags.name: Upload
tags.description: File upload endpoints for MinIO storage

get.description: Returns the health status of the API

post.description: Create a new user account and return authentication tokens

409.description: User with this email already exists

post.description: Get new access and refresh tokens using a valid refresh token

get.description: Get the authenticated user's information including profile

401.description: Unauthorized - No token or invalid token

400.description: Current password is incorrect or validation error

post.description: Create a new admin user. Only accessible by existing admins.

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Retrieve a list of all available interests

400.description: Validation error or interest already exists

get.description: Retrieve a single interest by ID

delete.description: Delete an existing interest (only if no users have it)

400.description: Cannot delete interest with associated users

get.description: Retrieve all interests for the authenticated user

post.summary: Add an interest to current user
post.description: Add a single interest to the authenticated user

put.description: Replace all interests for the authenticated user with a new set

400.description: Validation error or interests not found

post.summary: Add multiple interests to current user
post.description: Add multiple interests to the authenticated user at once

400.description: Validation error or interests not found

delete.summary: Remove an interest from current user
delete.description: Remove a single interest from the authenticated user

404.description: User does not have this interest

get.description: Retrieve the matriculation result for the authenticated user

post.summary: Create matriculation result for current user
post.description: Create a new matriculation result entry for the authenticated user

400.description: Validation error or matriculation already exists

put.description: Update the matriculation result for the authenticated user

delete.description: Delete the matriculation result for the authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of all matriculation results
Retrieve aggregate statistics for matriculation results

get.summary: Get matriculation result by ID (Admin only)
get.description: Retrieve a specific matriculation result by ID

get.summary: Get eligible programs for current user
get.description: Get list of programs the user is eligible for based on their matriculation results

parameters.name: region
parameters.description: Filter by university region (e.g., Yangon, Mandalay)

get.summary: Get AI-recommended programs for current user
get.description: Get personalized program recommendations based on matriculation results AND user interests

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of recommendations to return

matchReasons.description: Reasons why this program is recommended

get.summary: Get top programs for current user
get.description: Get the top N programs based on match score

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of top programs to return

post.description: Compare 2-5 programs side by side with eligibility check

400.description: Validation error or matriculation not found

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of universities with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, Myanmar name, or code

get.description: Retrieve a single university with its programs

delete.description: Delete an existing university (only if no programs exist)

400.description: Cannot delete university with existing programs

get.description: Retrieve all programs for a specific university
Retrieve a paginated list of programs with optional filters

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by name, Myanmar name, or code

parameters.name: minScore
parameters.description: Filter by minimum score (greater than or equal)

parameters.name: maxScore
parameters.description: Filter by maximum score (less than or equal)

post.description: Create a new program for a university

get.description: Retrieve a single program with its university and requirements

delete.description: Delete an existing program (only if no applications exist)

400.description: Cannot delete program with existing applications

post.description: Create subject score requirements for a program

put.description: Update subject score requirements for a program

delete.description: Delete subject score requirements for a program

photo.description: Profile photo (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP - max 5MB)
University photo (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP - max 5MB)

logo.description: University logo (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP - max 5MB)

image.description: Image file (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP - max 5MB)

get.summary: Get a presigned URL for temporary file access

parameters.name: expiry
parameters.description: URL expiry time in seconds (default 1 hour)

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: The file key to delete (URL encoded)

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users (without passwords)

409.description: User with this email already exists

get.description: Retrieve a specific user with their profile and matriculation data
Retrieve the profile of a specific user

post.description: Create a profile for a user (Myanmar University Application Form data)

409.description: Profile already exists or NRC already registered
